pageContent:
KAMAL TEJA MANCHU 
Greenville, SC |  kamalteja.manchu@gmail.com |  +1 502-715-0760 
Data Engineer 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
 
Accomplished analytics engineer with a proven track record in designing, implementing, and optimizing 
cloud solutions with a primary focus on Microsoft Azure. Adept in leveraging Azure data engineering 
services to    enhance efficiency, scalability, and reliability of big data solutions. Proven proficiency in  data 
architecture, ETL processes, and optimizing data storage for improved performance. Seeking to contribute 
my technical skills and knowledge to a dynamic analytics team. 
CORE COMPETENCIES 
 
• Azure cloud services 
• Collaboration and communication 
• ETL Process 
• Data Architecture &   Modeling 
• Azure Synapse Analytics 
• Azure Data Factory 
• Metadata-Driven Pipelines 
• Power BI 
• DevOps practices 
• Database management 
• Leadership skills 
• Python &   SQL 
Programming 
• Data Warehousing 
• CI/CD Pipelines 
• Mentorship &   Leadership

• Power BI 
• DevOps practices 
• Database management 
• Leadership skills 
• Python &   SQL 
Programming 
• Data Warehousing 
• CI/CD Pipelines 
• Mentorship &   Leadership 
• Security and compliance 
• Scripting and automation 
• Troubleshooting/problem  solving 
• Data Visualization 
• Data Lake Storage 
• Machine Learning (ML) 
• Databricks 
• PySpark 
• System design and architecture • Teamwork • Financial acumen 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
AI    Data Engineer Jan, 2024 – Present 
AIBES 
 
Directed a comprehensive initiative to enhance security infrastructure for both Active Directory and cloud services while 
simultaneously leading the development of data integration and reporting solutions using Azure Data Factory (ADF) and Power BI. 
The project included the design and deployment of ELT pipelines from multiple data sources, the creation of impactful reports and

The project included the design and deployment of ELT pipelines from multiple data sources, the creation of impactful reports and 
dashboards, and the automation of financial reporting processes. Additionally, Power BI training sessions were conducted to improve 
team productivity, and optimized solutions were deployed to reduce licensing costs. 
• Fortified the security infrastructure for Active Directory and cloud services, ensuring robust protection across platforms. 
• Developed end-to-end ELT pipelines in ADF, integrating data from diverse sources such as CSV, xlsx, ERP tables, and REST 
APIs. 
• Designed and deployed Power BI dashboards to track inventory and sales across multiple warehouses, leveraging data 
insights for impactful reporting. 
• Automated key financial reports in Power BI, reducing manual workloads by 10 hours weekly. 
• Provided Power BI training sessions that increased team productivity by 40% through improved data visualization skills.

• Provided Power BI training sessions that increased team productivity by 40% through improved data visualization skills. 
• Created comprehensive financial reports focusing on credit lines and cash balances, optimizing financial analysis processes. 
• Automated weekly sales performance reports in Power BI, further reducing manual data compilation time by 10 hours per 
week. 
• Deployed optimized reports through Power Pages, resulting in reduced licensing costs. 
 
Azure Data Engineer Sep, 2022 – Aug, 2023 
Cognizant 
 
Led the successful migration of a primary application backend and data warehouse architecture from on-premise systems to the 
Azure cloud, significantly enhancing performance, scalability, and reliability. This project involved designing and implementing 
scalable ETL pipelines in Azure Synapse, creating and optimizing metadata-driven solutions, and managing CI/CD pipelines using

scalable ETL pipelines in Azure Synapse, creating and optimizing metadata-driven solutions, and managing CI/CD pipelines using 
ARM templates to ensure smooth deployment across environments. The project was recognized with an EXCEL award for innovative 
pipeline management and included mentoring junior team members to drive project success. 
• Migrated on-premise data warehouse architecture to Azure cloud, collaborating closely with stakeholders to meet complex 
data requirements. 
• Designed, developed, and tested scalable metadata-driven pipelines, successfully migrating and optimizing ETL solutions. 
• Created and optimized DDL statements for over 1,000 tables, enhancing data process efficiency. 
• Managed CI/CD pipelines using ARM templates, ensuring seamless solution deployment across multiple environments. 
• Provided mentorship to junior team members, overseeing their task assignments and contributing to their professional growth.

Azure Data Engineer May,  2021 – Aug, 2022 
Tata Consultancy Services 
Developed and optimized comprehensive ELT pipelines in Azure Data Factory (ADF), leveraging Databricks Notebooks and Delta 
Lake architecture to enhance data processing efficiency and execution time. The project focused on migrating pipelines to Delta Lake 
from Azure Synapse Analytics, optimizing ARM templates for improved CI/CD processes, and utilizing Python and PySpark for 
advanced data analysis and solution development. 
• Developed ELT pipelines in ADF, transforming data using Databricks Notebooks into Delta Tables. 
• Migrated ADF pipelines to Delta Lake, transitioning data storage from Azure Synapse Analytics to optimize performance. 
• Optimized ADF's ARM template parameters to address limitations and ensure CI/CD efficiency. 
• Designed and implemented a    multi-layered Delta Lake architecture, significantly improving data processing efficiency and 
execution time.

• Designed and implemented a    multi-layered Delta Lake architecture, significantly improving data processing efficiency and 
execution time. 
• Leveraged Python and Spark for advanced data analysis, and the development of scalable solutions. 
Data/Machine Learning Engineer Mar,  2020 – Apr, 2021 
Tata Consultancy Services 
Led the analysis, profiling, and development of ETL solutions for multiple systems using complex SQL, while directing the migration 
of legacy systems to Microsoft Azure. The project involved building and optimizing data pipelines using Azure Data Factory, as well 
as developing and deploying machine learning models for advanced data analysis and process automation. 
• Led data analysis, profiling, and the development of ETL solutions for multiple systems, utilizing complex SQL to ensure data 
integrity and efficiency. 
• Directed the migration of legacy systems to Microsoft Azure, redesigning applications to leverage cloud-based scalability and 
performance.

integrity and efficiency. 
• Directed the migration of legacy systems to Microsoft Azure, redesigning applications to leverage cloud-based scalability and 
performance. 
• Built and optimized data pipelines using Azure Data Factory, implementing automated processes to enhance workflow 
efficiency. 
• Developed machine learning models for data analysis, overseeing projects from scope analysis through to deployment, 
ensuring successful implementation. 
• Developed custom YOLOv5 models for real-time object classification to streamline inventory management and 
operational workflows in warehouse settings. 
• Engaged in hyperparameter tuning and model optimization to achieve high accuracy levels in diverse lighting and 
background conditions common in warehouse environments. 
• Conducted ongoing testing and validation against a control set to continually enhance model robustness and reduce 
false positives/negatives in product classification.

• Conducted ongoing testing and validation against a control set to continually enhance model robustness and reduce 
false positives/negatives in product classification. 
• Led training sessions for junior engineers and data annotators, enhancing team skills in machine learning practices 
and tools specific to image recognition tasks. 
• Spearheaded the integration of image recognition models into existing warehouse management systems, ensuring 
seamless automation of product sorting and inventory tracking. 
• Authored and maintained detailed documentation on model development processes, dataset specifications, and 
performance benchmarks, which facilitated knowledge transfer and best practices in organization. 
Data Engineer Nov, 2017 – Feb, 2020 
Tata Consultancy Services 
• Installed and configured Hadoop Map Reduce, HDFS, developed multiple Map Reduce jobs in java and Scala for data 
cleaning and pre-processing.

Tata Consultancy Services 
• Installed and configured Hadoop Map Reduce, HDFS, developed multiple Map Reduce jobs in java and Scala for data 
cleaning and pre-processing. 
• Experience in developing scalable & secure data pipelines for large datasets. 
• Gathered requirements for ingestion of new data sources including life cycle, data quality check, transformations, and metadata 
enrichment. 
• Migrated on premise database structure to Confidential Redshift data warehouse. 
• Created data pipelines for different events to load the data from DynamoDB to AWS S3 bucket and then into HDFS and 
delivered high success metrics. 
• Importing data from MS SQL server and Teradata into HDFS using Sqoop. 
• Supported data quality management by implementing proper data quality checks in data pipelines. 
• Enhancing Data Ingestion Framework by creating more robust and secure data pipelines.

• Supported data quality management by implementing proper data quality checks in data pipelines. 
• Enhancing Data Ingestion Framework by creating more robust and secure data pipelines. 
• Responsible for cluster maintenance, adding and removing cluster nodes, cluster monitoring and troubleshooting, manage and 
review data backups, manage and review Hadoop log files. 
• Used Python for pattern matching in build logs to format warnings and errors 
• Implemented data streaming capability using Kafka for multiple data sources. 
• Responsible for maintaining and handling data inbound and outbound requests through big data platform. 
• Worked with multiple storage formats (Avro, Parquet) and databases (Hive, Impala, Kudu). 
• Involved in the development of agile, iterative, and proven data modeling patterns that provide flexibility. 
• Worked on connecting Cassandra database to the Amazon EMR File System for storing the database in S3.

• Worked on connecting Cassandra database to the Amazon EMR File System for storing the database in S3. 
• Created Oozie workflows to automate and productionize the data pipelines. 
• Involved in developing spark applications to perform ELT kind of operations on the data. 
• Worked with SCRUM team in delivering agreed user stories on time for every Sprint.

SKILLS

|  Azure Keyvault |  Azure Machine Learning |  Azure Stream Analytics

ETL Processes |  Data Warehousing |  Data Modeling |  Database Design |  Database Optimization |  Query Optimization |  Data 
Transformation

Regression | Classification | Clustering | Scikit Learn | Statsmodel | Hugging face | Tensorflow | Matplotlib | Seaborn | TF-IDF | LLM | AutoGen

University of Louisville, Louisville, KY | 4.0 GPA 
 
Post Graduation Diploma in  Data Science
